channel.title: Posting and server probs mods help please!
channel.description: so i made a server got no-ip and everything so when i try to post my server it says "you only get to post one server sorry". wtf is worng if anyone has any ideas please post ;D. if you dont im :| (screwed)[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 05:07:29 PM[/size][hr]so i got that figured out but whenever i log onto my server source and run my server and post my domain it says the server is offline anyone know the answer? [glow=red,2,300][size=50pt] O M G I HATE THIS PROB!!!!!!!
